LPC10 codec tests

What does it do?

How is it used?

To perform a general audio quality test, lpc10 should be run. The file ../test-data/local/short_nb_voice.wav will be compressed to LPC10 data, decompressed, and the resulting audio stored in post_lpc10.wav.
